Package com.ibm.team.process.common.advice

Interface Summary
IAdvisorDeclaration Static representation of an advisor which is configured for an advisable operation.
IAdvisorInfo An advisor info reports information for an operation advisor.
IAdvisorInfoCollector Report info collector which can create new infos for an operation advisor.
IAdvisorReport A report which encapsulates the result of executing an operation advisor.
IItemsResponse Operation response which carries a collection of persisted items (IItem).
IObjectsResponse Operation response which carries a collection of data transfer objects (EObject).
IOperationConfigurationInfo An operation configuration info provides enough information for the server process to determine if an operation configuration is correct for a given time and place.
IOperationReport A report which encapsulates the result of advising and possibly executing an operation.
IParticipantDeclaration Static representation of a operation participant which is configured for an advisable operation.
IParticipantReport A report which encapsulates the result of executing an operation participant.
IProcessConfigurationSource A process configuration source provides enough information for a server process to determine if a process configuration is correct for a given time and place.
IProcessReport A report for an element of the process runtime, including operations, advisors, and participants.
IReportInfo A report info reports information for an operation, operation advisor, or operation participant.
IReportInfoCollector Collector which is passed to implementors of operation advisors and participants.
 

Class Summary
AdvisableOperation An operation advisable by process.
ProcessRunnable Runnable which is executed by the Process framework without support for advisors and participants, but which can return an operation report.
ProjectOperation An operation which is governed by a project area.
 

Exception Summary
TeamOperationCanceledException Exception which is thrown when an operation is cancelled by process.
